means: 将船倾侧，将船倾倒（以清洗、捻缝或修理）

sentence.Network_en: Their ship was put into port to careen and refit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的轮船被送入港口倾侧待修.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... carat n． （宝石重量单位）克拉，（金子）开 careen v． （船）倾斜，使倾斜 caret n． 加字符号.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(C2)|无忧教育 ... careen 把船倾侧 careen 使船倾斜 careen 使船倾斜使船倾斜.
交通英语词汇 ... derelict 弃船 careen (使)倾侧 roll 颠簸.
careen tackle 防倾绞辘careen 把船倾侧careen 使船倾斜

list.abs: careening tackle 防倾绞辘careening wharf 倾斜修船码头careening 倾斜试验
care 谨慎careen grid 格子板careen grid 格子板;船架
careening site 倾船场careening tackle 防倾绞辘careening wharf 倾斜修船码头

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (as a noun denoting the position of a careened ship): from French carène, from Italian carena, from Latin carina 'a keel'

entry.def: To careen somewhere means to rush forward in an uncontrollable way.

example.ex: He stood to one side as they careened past him...
example.tran: 他们在他身边疾驰而过，他赶紧让到一边。

example.ex: The truck sways wildly, careening down narrow mountain roads.
example.tran: 卡车疯狂地左摇右晃,从狭窄的山路上急冲而下。

means.word_mean: 1. walk as if unable to control one's movements;

sentences.sentence: "The drunken man staggered into the room"

means.word_mean: 2. move sideways or in an unsteady way;
<美>(车辆)歪歪斜斜地行驶;猛冲

sentences.en: He careened through foreign territories on a desperate kind of blitz.
sentences.cn: 在孤注一掷地闪电战中他猛冲过外国领地。
